mapper.select: select s.shopper_no, p.product_no, p.product_name, p.product_option, p.discount_price from wish w, product p, shopper s where s.shopper_id = #{shopper_id} and s.shopper_no = w.shopper_no and p.product_no = w.product_no order by p.product_no desc
mapper.delete: delete from wish where shopper_no = #{shopper_no} and product_no = #{product_no}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(shopper_no, product_no, cart_product_stock) values(#{SHOPPER_NO}, #{PRODUCT_NO}, #{CART_PRODUCT_STOCK})
